front.title: A YANG Data Model for a Truststore

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG 1.1 data model for configuring global sets of X.509 certificates, SSH host-keys, raw public keys, and PSKs (pairwise-symmetric or pre-shared keys) that can be referenced by other data models for trust. While the SSH host-keys are uniquely for the SSH protocol, certificates, raw public keys, and PSKs may have multiple uses, including authenticating protocol peers and verifying signatures.
